titleStmt.title: The map of Mock-begger Hall with his scituation in the spacious countrey, called, Anywhere. To the tune of It is not your notherne Nancy: or sweet is the lasse that loues mee.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Richard Harper, neere to the Hospitall gate in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "I reade in ancient times of yore,".
In two parts; woodcut illustrations at head of each part.
Line 1 of text, part 1 = line 25 of STC 17990 (1640? version).--STC.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
